Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, we're confident it will meet your needs perfectly. We're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $10,000, considering its immense worth to you stands at $12,000. This opportunity not only secures you substantial savings but also ensures you acquire a high-value asset that aligns with your business objectives. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this valuable solution to your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
